item.title: O'Neil pulls out of running for shock Wolves return
item.description: Gary O'Neil pulls out of the running to become Wolves manager after coming close to a shock return.

item.title: Earl ready and willing to start as England centre
item.description: England back row Ben Earl says he trusts Steve Borthwick if the head coach decides to deploy him as a starting centre.

item.title: 'Do you want to die?: Train attack victim describes confrontation with alleged attacker
item.description: Stephen Crean was among those injured in a knife attack on a train in Cambridgeshire on Saturday evening.
